20110108023323.000|20110108023324.000|CC1|DOZEN OTHER COUNTRIES.

20110108023326.000|20110108023327.000|CC1|THE PRICE OF FOOD.

20110108023338.000|20110108023339.000|CC1|CLIMBING AGAIN AND THE U.N.

20110108024000.000|20110108024004.000|CC1|MAKES FOOD FOR ANIMALS BUT ALSO 
20110108024004.000|20110108024005.000|CC1|INDUSTRIAL PICKUP TRUCKS.

20110108024007.000|20110108024009.000|CC1|THE GERMANY AUTHORITIES SAY     
20110108024009.000|20110108024014.000|CC1|THAT DIOXIN LEVELS WERE 77

20110108024019.000|20110108024021.000|CC1|BUT THE INFORMATION NEVER       
20110108024021.000|20110108024022.000|CC1|REACHED THE PUBLIC.             
20110108024022.000|20110108024024.000|CC1|IN GERMANY THE AUTHORITIES ARE  
20110108024024.000|20110108024025.000|CC1|TRYING TO GET TO GRIPS WITH A   
20110108024025.000|20110108024028.000|CC1|CRISIS THAT SPREADS.            
20110108024028.000|20110108024034.000|CC1|>> HE SAYS, IT IS               
20110108024034.000|20110108024036.000|CC1|INCOMPREHENSIBLE FOR CONSUMERS
